amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting programs related to the ground-based midcourse defense and the long-range discrimination radar programs of the Department of Defense.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 505 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 505 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S1977-1978; text: CR S1977) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to supporting programs related to the ground-based midcourse defense and the long-range discrimination radar programs of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 505 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Sullivan.
